page.title: 04PUNKS IN ROMSEY
page.content: Most punks became punk for the image, because the clothes were cheaper or for something to do. One punk said even though he was on the dole he felt as if he meant something because he was a punk, not just another statistic on a dole chart. They said that their main food was chips, and they ate at odd times rather than at meal times, either at home or on a park bench. They get up quite late, go out about 12.30 and come in whenever they want. Their spare time, of which they have a lot, is spent hanging around with friends, sometimes playing space-invader machines, with money from dole, social security or sometimes from parents. Out of 50 punks, 47 were unemployed, 44 smoked - they withheld information about drugs.
